item.title: Hugo: From Zero to One
item.description: What is Hugo? Hugo is a CLI tool to build and maintain static HTML sites from source code. With Hugo you define the structure and style of the site once so that you can focus on the content. After you have an initial structure, style, and content, Hugo will be able to automatically include partials and layouts into pages, generate sitemaps, and build lists based completely on the content you write.
